bookinfo.title: Methods Available for Automation
bookinfo.subtitle: Advanced automation methods for CloudForms Management Engine

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.para: This guide provides advanced methods for CloudForms Management Engine's automation functions. Methods can be used from within CloudForms Management Engine to create custom actions and workflows for the objects managed by CloudForms Management Engine. Information and procedures in this book are relevant to CloudForms Management Engine administrators. This document is organized by the object hierarchy in the Automate Model.
